casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. King, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. King (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 90.]

(No. 94-1396 Submitted October 11, 1994 Decided December 7, 1994.) John W. Baker, Knox County Prosecuting Attorney, and Robert J. McClaren, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Dale E. King, pro se. *91 Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the cited reason stated therein.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
